page.title: 04BEEF CATTLE _BRISCO HALL FM.
page.content: Brisco Hall Farm is a farm which rears cattle for beef.Most of the farms in this area are dairy farms,however,and much smaller. The cows which Mr.Coulthard has are mainly Herefords but he has Aberdeen Angus,Simmental and Charolais bulls which he uses for breeding. {********************************} Mr.Coulthard thinks that,although many farmers were not very sure at first about joining the E.E.C.,they would have been in much trouble now if Britain had voted against it.The E.E.C. rules had not affected him very much and there were many advantages such as increased trade and improved co_operation. Most farmers agree that the biggest changes in the industry have been; greater dependence on machinery, intensification and more productivity.
